personalInfo.name: Anuja Dhanekula
personalInfo.title: Senior IBM Maximo Developer & EAM Specialist
personalInfo.tagline: Enterprise Asset Management Expert | BIRT Reporting | SQL | IBM Maximo Certified

professionalSummary: Over 5 years of full-time experience in Maximo application configuration, development, implementation, upgrading, testing and integration
EAM professional with hands-on expertise in IBM Maximo Transportation add-on for optimizing asset management and maintenance workflows
Proficient in Maximo and WebSphere installs, including new fix packs, interim fixes, and analyses with strong understanding of Maximo EAR build and deployment processes
Demonstrated expertise in strengthening system security by implementing and configuring TLS certificates across Maximo and WebSphere

Strong functional knowledge of Maximo application modules including Asset Management, Work Management, Preventive Maintenance, Materials Management, Service Management, Purchasing, and Contract Management
Expert in business object customization, screen customization, and Maximo Integration Framework (MIF) configuration
Skilled in troubleshooting, resolving technical issues, and monitoring Maximo System functionality

experience.client: Trailer Train Company (TTX - Railcar pooling experts)

environment.tools: EAM Maximo 7.6.1.2/7.6.1.3, SQL Server, Visual Studio, Azure DevOps, Service Now, Postman

achievements: Led Maximo upgrade from version 7.6.1.2 to 7.6.1.3, ensuring minimal downtime and complete data integrity
Implemented TLS configuration across Maximo and WebSphere environments, significantly enhancing system security
Developed and maintained complex Automation Scripts and custom MBO and field-level classes
Performed numerous IFIX installations with expertise in Maximo EAR build and deployment processes
Conducted API testing using Postman for seamless external web service integration
Managed integration testing, message monitoring, and queue issue resolution
Collaborated with IBM on multiple PMRs for comprehensive risk assessment and proactive problem resolution
responsibilities: Configured and customized Maximo applications using Application Designer to meet client requirements
Created and managed users, application access, and security privileges
Modified communication templates for effective stakeholder communication
Performed data fixes through SQL to ensure seamless data synchronization
Executed SSIS package modifications, check-ins, and deployments
Developed SQL scripts including inner queries, hierarchy queries, and stored procedures
Analyzed root causes for major production issues and provided timely resolutions
Provided training and comprehensive support to new team members
Served as key support person for production incident management
Maintained detailed documentation of configurations, customizations, and best practices

achievements: Successfully reduced Java customization by implementing Automation and Integration Scripts
Designed and developed custom BIRT reports improving operational visibility
Built comprehensive object structures for Assets and Work Orders optimizing business workflows
Created efficient Master Data Templates for streamlined data migration
responsibilities: Developed Automation Scripts and Integration Scripts for business process automation
Performed database configuration changes and customizations per user requirements
Developed SQL scripts for database queries and created custom objects with relationships
Designed Maximo applications using Application Designer
Created escalations, actions, roles, conditional expressions, workflows, and communication templates
Built Start Centers and result sets for enhanced user experience
Managed user creation and application access based on security matrix
Created custom domains (CROSSOVER, TABLE, ALN) specific to client requirements
Handled inbound and outbound transactions using Maximo Integration Framework (MIF)
Developed Actuate and BIRT reports for Asset and Work Order modules
Provided production support and implemented production changes
Trained new hires on Maximo functionality and best practices

certifications.name: IBM Certified Deployment Professional - Maximo Manage v8.0
IBM Maximo Asset Management v7.6 Functional Analyst
IBM Certified Advanced Deployment Professional - Maximo Asset Management v7.6
IBM Maximo Asset Management v7.6 Infrastructure and Implementation

education.degree: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering

careerHighlights: 5+ years of specialized experience in IBM Maximo EAM solutions
Successfully led Maximo version upgrade with zero data loss
Expert in both development and production support
Strong SQL and database optimization skills

keyProjects.name: Maximo 7.6.1.2 to 7.6.1.3 Upgrade
keyProjects.description: Led the complete upgrade of Maximo system ensuring minimal downtime and data integrity
keyProjects.impact: Successfully migrated production system with zero data loss and improved performance

keyProjects.name: TLS Security Implementation
keyProjects.description: Implemented and configured TLS certificates across Maximo and WebSphere environments
keyProjects.impact: Enhanced system security and ensured compliance with enterprise security standards

keyProjects.name: SSIS Integration & Data Migration
keyProjects.description: Developed and deployed SSIS packages for automated data migration and synchronization
keyProjects.impact: Automated data workflows reducing manual effort by 70%

testimonials.name: Technical Manager
testimonials.text: Anuja is an exceptional Maximo developer with deep technical expertise. Her ability to troubleshoot complex issues and deliver solutions under tight deadlines is remarkable. She played a crucial role in our Maximo upgrade project and consistently exceeded expectations.

testimonials.name: Project Lead
testimonials.text: Working with Anuja was a great experience. Her proficiency in Maximo configuration and automation scripts significantly improved our project delivery. She has excellent problem-solving skills and is always willing to mentor junior team members.

testimonials.name: Client Stakeholder
testimonials.text: Anuja demonstrated outstanding technical skills and professionalism throughout our engagement. Her expertise in IBM Maximo and ability to understand our business requirements made her an invaluable asset to our EAM transformation project.

testimonials.name: Team Member
testimonials.text: Anuja is a highly skilled professional with comprehensive knowledge of IBM Maximo. She has been instrumental in solving critical production issues and her documentation practices have helped the entire team. A true team player!
